item.title: Rare Chicago Dust Storm Turns Day Into Night
item.description: Day turned to night in northwest Indiana and north-central Illinois on Friday as a rare dust storm shrouded the skies.

item.title: Why There’s No Battlefield Solution to India’s Perpetual Pakistan Problem
item.description: This month’s violent escalation reminded the world how India’s gradual rise can be hindered by the troublesome country next door.

item.title: Mexican Navy Sailing Ship Crashes Into Brooklyn Bridge, Killing 2
item.description: There were 277 people on board, and at least 19 were injured, the authorities said.

item.title: Trump Is Far From the First Corrupt U.S. Politician
item.description: American politicians have been for sale for far longer than Donald Trump has been around and in far more ways than he and his family have so far pione...

item.title: As Europe Speeds By on Rail, America Is Stuck in Traffic
item.description: As Europe embraces the night train, the United States seems to be sleepwalking into a transport dead end.
